summary: A gunman joins up with a gang of Confederate guerrillas to find a cache of missing Confederate gold.
cast: Edd Byrnes|Ennio Girolami|Luisa Baratto|Federico Boido|Aysanoa Runachagua|Attilio Severini|Giulio Maculani|Piero Vida|Mario Donen|Marco Mariani|Adriana Facchetti|Mirella Pamphili|Rossella Bergamonti|Guy Madison|Angelo Boscariol|Alberigo Donadeo|Gina Mascetti|Franco Ukmar
director: Director: Enzo G. Castellari (as E.G. Rowland)
title: 7 Winchester para una matanza
